name: conference
title: conference

context_script:
context.days = frappe.db.sql("SELECT t.day FROM `tabConference` c inner JOIN `tabConference Talks` t on c.name = t.conference  where c.city = %(city)s and c.year=%(year)s and t.status = 'Confirmed' group by t.day", args, as_dict=True )
context.day = frappe.form_dict.day or context.days[0].day
args['day'] = context.day

talks = frappe.db.sql("""SELECT t.* FROM `tabConference` c inner JOIN `tabConference Talks` t on c.name = t.conference  where c.city = %(city)s and c.year=%(year)s and t.day = %(day)s and t.status = 'Confirmed' order by t.idx asc""", args, as_dict=True )

hall1talks = []

for talk in talks:
    hall1talks.append(talk)


context.hall1talks = hall1talks

def make_talk(title, start_time="", end_time="", is_break=False): 
    return {
        "name": title, 
        "start_time": start_time,
        "end_time": end_time,
        "break": is_break
    }
    
def get_talk_time(talk):
    return talk['start_time']
javascript:
path = window.location.pathname.substring(0, window.location.pathname.length - 9) const urlParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); var label = 'Home' if(urlParams.has('t')){ label = urlParams.get('t') } $('.page-breadcrumbs')[0].innerHTML = `
  1. ` + label + `
  2. Schedule
` function formatTime(time, id){ document.getElementById(id).innerHTML = moment(time, "HH:mm:ss").format("h A"); }
name: conference-schedule
title: Conference Schedule
